snippet: Los Angeles Galaxy midfielder Nigel de Jong was suspended three games and fined for a tackle that left Portland Timbers midfielder Darlington Nagbe with a sprained left ankle.
abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy midfielder Nigel de Jong gets three-game suspension and fine for tackle that injured Portland Timbers midfielder Darlington Nagbe; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Galaxy midfielder Nigel de Jong was suspended three games and fined for a tackle that left Portland Timbers midfielder Darlington Nagbe with a sprained left ankle.
